description: This file contains API interaction functions for managing teams, team runs, and sessions in a backend system, including both synchronous and asynchronous methods.

methods.name: create_team_run
methods.description: Creates a team run synchronously, logging the process and handling API responses.

methods.name: acreate_team_run
methods.description: Asynchronously creates a team run, with logging and error handling.

methods.name: upsert_team_session
methods.description: Creates or updates a team session synchronously, with logging and error handling.

methods.name: create_team
methods.description: Creates a team synchronously, with logging and error handling.

methods.name: acreate_team
methods.description: Asynchronously creates a team, with logging and error handling.
